::Dragonfly/Other bots::

"WOW... " Though Dragonfly "If I don't do my best... I'll rest in 
peace here or in home.. Forever"


"HElloo" Said Dragonfly while him and his group landed "Who's in 
charge here????"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> " Have a feeling Destructor may have arrived there. If so, he'll 
pave 
> the way for us. SO it should be smooth sailing untill we get 
there." 
> She looked at Starscream, "Nice to have you back with us. I was 
> starting to get worried you had gotten scrapped or something." She 
> turned her head to face front and followed the signal to the ship.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > DrillBit nods, following KitKat. "The transmission said he had a 
> > battle cruiser. It'd be a bit hard to take out."
> > 
> > Coming up alongside KitKat, he glances down at the ground way 
under 
> > him. He didn't like flying. Digging through the ground was better.
> >
